content:
Widder family

1 Markus WIDDER                      1753-60 - 1837 #221 (Eber) {census fam 92}
 + Rywka                             1750-65 - 1829 #157 (Dawid)
  2x Abraham Eber WIDDER             1793 - 1846 #292

       + Rela SAGAN                  1816-17
             married 1835 #8,  divorced Dec 22, 1845 #1
